content: ❤️ in this crochet tutorial we re going to make a mini jigglypuff optional as a keychain step by step perfect for gifting and decorating it s super cute quick and fun to make español https //youtu be/5q_lbbxoqv8 english https //youtu be/t89boxwdgdq you can find the written pattern from the video in pdf complete https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/4329724699 materials used chenille yarn pink black you can find them here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_depmvpp materials used for cotton version cotton yarn pink 10 black 21 you can find them here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_onohllm difficulty level 2/5 available languages english spanish final size 7 cm / 2 75 inches tall varies depending on materials used ❤️ if you love amigurumis and want to discover more fun and unique patterns please subscribe to my youtube channel and turn on the notification bell so you don t miss any new videos ❤️ note this pattern is for personal use only please do not share upload or distribute it on social media or any other platform ✅ you re welcome to sell the finished items don t forget to give credit to amigurumisatina as the designer enjoy crocheting and may your jigglypuff come to life with lots of love ♥
